Text:
I just downloaded the .txt files since I'm building a mini library for my DS, so I can't say much about the rest of the torrent, but the variety of ebooks within the .txt section is nice. Found some real gems, as well as some fun, nostalgic ebooks (Goosebumps ftw!).

Would have been nice if some of the .txt files were cleaned up and formatted though (some of them are just giant walls of text), but this problem isn't that huge. Thank you Anonymous!
I am also only downloading the TXT files. Thanks for these.
thank you !!enough reading for several years !!
